top.title: Around 40 dead in Swiss ski resort bar fire
top.summary: Around 115 are injured - some severely - in fire at Crans-Montana Swiss ski resort bar Le Constellation.

top.title: Two killed in clashes between protesters and security forces in Iran

top.summary: The move is designed to ensure people pay all relevant tax on buying and selling crypto.

top.title: Meta buys Chinese-founded AI start-up Manus
top.summary: The tech giant wants to build into its own AI tools which do complex things with minimal interaction.

top.title: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again
